channel.title: I can't run my server?
channel.description:
So i downloaded this "easyRSC" cuz i wanted to try it.. and when i run it i get this:
http://prntscr.com/50nfvp sorry the errors just dissapears super fast and it just closes after..
My run.bat is : [code]@echo off TITLE EasyRSC set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin ant runserver exit[/code]
i think its super strange..
EDIT: btw it dosent helt på use "pause" instead of "exit" someone explain what to do?

item.title: I can't run my server?
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

i believe you need to go in your apache files and put in a pause… or if u wanna test eye hand coordination then you can try and time out pausebreak with when the error start scrolling.

Read full topic

item.title: I can't run my server?
item.dc:creator: @gangsta352 gangsta352
item.description:
@gangsta352 wrote:

[quote=“Quintorz, post:1, topic:547519”]So i downloaded this “easyRSC” cuz i wanted to try it… and when i run it i get this:

http://prntscr.com/50nfvp
sorry the errors just dissapears super fast and it just closes after…

My run.bat is :

@echo off TITLE EasyRSC set PATH=%PATH%;ant\bin ant runserver exit

i think its super strange…

EDIT:
btw it dosent helt på use “pause” instead of "exit"
someone explain what to do?[/quote]

press ctrl+c before it crashes and it will pause it, you need to make sure your environment variables are set correctly! you can find this information in some of the stickies.

Read full topic
